Texts.Chs: 把^orange;伊格纳斯辣椒种子^reset;带给戴单眼镜的蚁族人。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Ignus Chili Seeds^reset; to the monocled Thelusian at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我已经迫不及待要把它做成辣酱了！拿着这块^green;合金^reset;：它在你那更有用处。啊，爽。
Texts.Eng: I can't wait to make some chili with these! Take this ^green;alloy^reset;: it should do you more good than I. Enjoy.

Texts.Chs: 我非常喜欢吃辣，但在这里很难得到辣椒。能使用^orange;植物合成器^white;为我制作一些^green;伊格纳斯辣椒种子^reset;吗？我会给你奖励的。
Texts.Eng: I love spicy foods but getting what I need here is a pain. Using a ^orange;Gene Design Lab^reset; could you perhaps make me some ^orange;Ignus Chili Seeds^reset;? I'd reward you for the effort.
